Football Registration Form
Hall 10 and 11 Welcomes You

Football Team Registration

Instructions:

1. Fill in the Team Name and Select the Hall first. Please note that only details corresponding to the chosen hall should be filled – both the captain and players must be from the same hall.

2. The venue is tentatively set at the Hall 10 & 11 Common Yard. Depending on the number of teams registered, the final venue and date will be decided after considering resident feedback. To avoid any issues in the future (for example, if we end up playing in the institute football ground), please try to fill in details for all 10 players.

3. After submission, the captain will be contacted for further details.

4. Only the team captain fills out the form.

5. For best results, use a Desktop or Laptop.

<style>
  /* New Vibrant Colorful Theme with Blurred Splash Background */
  body {
    font-family: 'Arial', sans-serif;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0; /* remove extra padding to allow splash screen full view */
    background-color: #FFF8E1; /* Light yellow */
    color: #212121;
  }
  /* Splash Screen Styles */
  #splash-screen {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    height: 100vh;
    position: relative;
    overflow: hidden;
    text-align: center;
  }
  #splash-screen::before {
    content: "";
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #B3E5FC, #81D4FA); /* New light blue gradient */
    filter: blur(5px); /* Slight blur */
    z-index: -1;
  }
  .splash-title {
    font-size: 3rem;
    color: #D32F2F;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    animation: fadeIn 2s ease-in-out;
  }
  #enter-btn {
    padding: 15px 30px;
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    background-color: #E91E63;
    color: white;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 8px;
    cursor: pointer;
    animation: fadeIn 2s ease-in-out;
  }
  #enter-btn:hover {
    background-color: #C2185B;
  }
  @keyframes fadeIn {
    from { opacity: 0; transform: scale(0.8); }
    to { opacity: 1; transform: scale(1); }
  }
  
  /* Registration Form Container */
  #registration-container {
    display: none;
    padding: 20px;
    background-color: #FFFFFF;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
    border-radius: 10px;
    border: 1px solid #FF9800;
    margin: 20px;
  }
  
  h1, h3, h2 {
    text-align: center;
    color: #D32F2F;
  }
  h1 {
    font-size: 2.5rem;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
  }
  h2 {
    font-size: 2rem;
    margin-top: 40px;
  }
  h3 {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    margin-top: 5px;
    color: #D32F2F;
  }
  p {
    text-align: left;
    font-size: 1.2rem;
    color: #212121;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
  }
  form {
    max-width: 900px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 20px;
    background-color: #FFFFFF;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
    border-radius: 10px;
    border: 1px solid #FF9800;
  }
  label {
    font-weight: bold;
    margin-bottom: 5px;
    display: block;
    font-size: 1.2rem;
    color: #1976D2;
  }
  input[type="text"],
  input[type="email"],
  select {
    width: 97%;
    padding: 10px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    border: 1px solid #FF9800;
    border-radius: 5px;
    font-size: 1rem;
    background-color: #FFFFFF;
  }
  input[type="text"]:focus,
  input[type="email"]:focus,
  select:focus {
    border-color: #FBC02D;
    outline: none;
    box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(251,192,45,0.5);
  }
  button {
    background-color: #E91E63;
    color: white;
    border: none;
    padding: 10px 20px;
    border-radius: 5px;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-size: 1rem;
    margin-right: 10px;
    transition: background-color 0.3s ease;
  }
  button:hover {
    background-color: #C2185B;
  }
  button:disabled {
    background-color: #B0BEC5;
    cursor: not-allowed;
  }
  /* Team Members Section */
  #players-container {
    margin-top: 20px;
  }
  #players-container .row {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 10px;
    padding: 10px 0;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #EEEEEE;
    background-color: #F5F5F5;
  }
  #players-container .row:nth-child(even) {
    background-color: #E0F7FA;
  }
  #players-container .row:last-child {
    border-bottom: none;
  }
  #players-container label {
    flex: 1 1 12%;
    text-align: right;
    padding-right: 10px;
    font-size: 0.9rem;
    color: #1976D2;
  }
  #players-container input {
    flex: 1 1 18%;
    padding: 10px;
    font-size: 0.9rem;
    border: 1px solid #FF9800;
    border-radius: 5px;
    background-color: #FFFFFF;
  }
  #players-container .name-input {
    flex: 2 1 40%;
  }
  #players-container .roll-input,
  #players-container .room-input {
    flex: 1 1 12%;
  }
  #players-container button {
    flex: 0 0 8%;
    padding: 8px 12px;
    font-size: 0.8rem;
    background-color: #E64A19;
    color: white;
    border-radius: 5px;
  }
  #players-container button:hover {
    background-color: #D84315;
  }
  #team-name {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 10px;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    border: 1px solid #FF9800;
    border-radius: 5px;
    background-color: #FFFFFF;
  }
  #team-name:focus {
    border-color: #FF9800;
    outline: none;
    box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(251,192,45,0.5);
  }
  /* Submit Button */
  form button {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    max-width: 250px;
    margin: 20px auto;
    background-color: #E91E63;
    color: white;
  }
  form button:hover {
    background-color: #C2185B;
  }
  /* Registered Teams Section */
  #registered-teams-container {
    max-width: 900px;
    margin: 40px auto 0;
    padding: 20px;
    background-color: #FFFFFF;
    border: 1px solid #FF9800;
    border-radius: 10px;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
  }
  .team-item {
    border: 1px solid #FF9800;
    padding: 10px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    border-radius: 5px;
    background-color: #C5E1A5;
  }
  .team-item h3 {
    margin-top: 0;
    font-size: 1.5rem;
  }
  .team-item ul {
    margin: 5px 0 0 20px;
  }
  @media (max-width: 768px) {
    #players-container .row {
      flex-wrap: wrap;
    }
    #players-container label,
    #players-container input,
    #players-container button,
    select {
      flex: 1 1 100%;
      text-align: left;
      margin-bottom: 5px;
    }
  }
</style>
